result.title: eport on ontology usage and requirements Workflow for ontological development and maintenance
result.description: -Existing ontologies will be analysed and list of new ontology entries will be proposed to maintainers of eNanoMapper and EMMO ontology. result.title: Pure material models for computing physicochemical descriptors of ENM
result.description: POLITO will prepare a set of datasheets about material models for computing physicochemical descriptors of ENM in a format agreed with the leading partners involved in material modelling in T3a beforehand The datasheets will be in line with the requirements of the MOdelling DAta MODA approach httpswwwceneuNewsWorkshopsPagesWS2017012aspx and with the European Materials Modelling Ontology EMMO for semantic interoperability httpsemmcinfo These datasheets will report i the material modelling workflows and ii the corresponding computed values about the preliminary list of advanced descriptors WP45 agreed in D33 at M12 Each computed descriptor will be reported with the corresponding uncertainty for validation WP6

result.title: R1: Causal Model: methodology and results
result.description: Public report and open data repository delivered at the end of M28. This document will contain: a description of the actions made to collect the information needed to adjust the Causal Diagram, the data collected and the actual results as well as a description of the methodologies followed to integrate the Causal Diagram with the data together with the final model achieved. The database will be published in an open-access database (ensuring full compliance with the FAIR principles) to be reused by the stakeholders and the research community. This deliverable will be peer reviewed by scientific experts.

result.title: R4.2: Online Reference Documentation of the WHY Toolkit
result.description: Public report and online documentation delivered at M33. The report will contain the text of the technical documentation including a general introduction, practical examples, configuration manuals and the tailor-made chapters to cover specific needs of the different stakeholders. Multimedia content will be published on the repository used to host the online documentation. This deliverable will be peer reviewed by technical experts.

result.title: Report on the integration of the WHY Toolkit with the energy models
result.description: Public report and open data repository delivered at the end of M30. The report will contain the description of implementation of the Use Cases on the WHY Toolkit, the data collected and the results of the test simulations carried out. The database will be published in an open-access database (ensuring full compliance with the FAIR principles) to be reused by the stakeholders and the research community. This deliverable will be peer reviewed by scientific experts.

result.title: Quality management plan
result.description: The quality management plan will include an updated, detailed project management plan, Gantt chart and Work Breakdown Structure. It will display at least a schedule per task, responsible partner, related subtasks, related deliverables and dependencies to other tasks. Revisions of the project management plan will be made on month 15 and month 27.

result.title: Structure, contents and operation mechanisms of BIPV products portfolio
result.description: The deliverable will define the technical information needed for each product: PV technology, nominal power, possible architectural applications, customization, life cycle, price, etc. As for operation mechanisms, it will describe a search tool able to select the optimum product at project design level; as well as preliminary production estimates as a function of location, orientation, tilt, etc. to facilitate a first evaluation of economic viability of the BIPV products. To be updated in months 24 and 36.
